attributes.action: Find and arrest the CEO/MD and other senior management within the banking industry whose bank has fallen foul of the credit crunch, arrest them and send them to prison and never let them work in the banking industry again and also strip them of there assets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think the fat cats in the city have turned the slowdown in the economy into a steep decline, they have been taking risks which have destabilised the economy and destroyed peoples pensions which will make people suffer in the future.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
